body_html: @chenwc07 I think above shows that device 1 in your setup is broken... Can you try running a model on that device exclusively, without using the DataParallel wrapper? If you still get the same unhandled CUDA error then that would confirm the device being broken.
body_text: @chenwc07 I think above shows that device 1 in your setup is broken... Can you try running a model on that device exclusively, without using the DataParallel wrapper? If you still get the same unhandled CUDA error then that would confirm the device being broken.
body: @chenwc07 I think above shows that device 1 in your setup is broken... Can you try running a model on that device exclusively, without using the DataParallel wrapper? If you still get the same unhandled CUDA error then that would confirm the device being broken.
